starters.name: Medu Vada
starters.description: Crispy, savory lentil doughnuts, soft on the inside, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

starters.name: Masala Dosa
starters.description: A thin, crispy crepe made from fermented rice and lentils, filled with a savory potato masala.

starters.name: Idli with Sambar
starters.description: Steamed savory rice cakes, soft and fluffy, served with a flavorful lentil-based vegetable stew.

mainCourses.name: Chettinad Chicken Curry
mainCourses.description: A fiery, aromatic curry from the Chettinad region, made with a blend of roasted spices and tender chicken.

mainCourses.name: Mutton Biryani
mainCourses.description: Fragrant basmati rice slow-cooked with succulent mutton pieces and a rich blend of traditional spices.

mainCourses.name: Meen Kuzhambu
mainCourses.description: A tangy and spicy fish curry made with tamarind, coconut, and freshly ground spices.

mainCourses.name: Sambar Sadam
mainCourses.description: A comforting one-pot meal of rice and lentils cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic sambar powder.

desserts.name: Semiya Payasam
desserts.description: A creamy vermicelli pudding made with milk, sweetened with sugar, and flavored with cardamom and nuts.

desserts.name: Rava Kesari
desserts.description: A sweet South Indian dessert made from semolina, ghee, sugar, and saffron, garnished with cashews.

desserts.name: Mysore Pak
desserts.description: A rich, melt-in-your-mouth sweet made from gram flour, generous amounts of ghee, and sugar.

veg.name: Vegetable Biryani
veg.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables, aromatic spices, and saffron.

veg.name: Paneer Butter Masala
veg.description: Soft cottage cheese cubes in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices.

veg.name: Dal Makhani
veg.description: Creamy black lentils slow-cooked with butter, cream, and aromatic spices.

veg.name: Aloo Gobi
veg.description: A classic North Indian dish of potatoes and cauliflower cooked with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

veg.name: Chana Masala
veg.description: Spiced chickpeas cooked in a tangy tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices.

veg.name: Vegetable Curry
veg.description: Mixed vegetables cooked in a flavorful coconut-based curry with South Indian spices.
